column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Had to try Chicago deep dish again. The hostess was friendly. I sat at the bar
column2: which was great. It was a busy night
column3: and the place was hoping with energy around different sporting events. I liked watching the bartender serve the pizzas in worn
column4: hot skillets with tongs and a serving spatula. The bartender was very friendly and charming.
